org.hibernate.envers.boot.spi

Interface AuditMetadataBuildingOptions

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AuditServiceOptions

    public interface AuditMetadataBuildingOptions
extends AuditServiceOptions
    Describes the options used while building the AuditMetadata object (during MetadataBuilder.build() processing).
    Since:
    6.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCustomAuditTableName(String entityName, String tableName)
      Add a custom audit table name for the specified entity name.
      String getAuditEntityName(String entityName)
      Get the specified entityName as the audited entity name by applying any prefix/suffix configuration attributes to the specified value.
      String getAuditTableName(String entityName, String tableName)
      Get the entity name's audit table.
      String getRevisionPropertyPath(String propertyName)
      Get the specified propertyName's property path.
      ServiceRegistry getServiceRegistry()
      The service registry to use when building the metadata.

        The service registry to use when building the metadata.

      • getAuditEntityName

        String getAuditEntityName(String entityName)
        Get the specified entityName as the audited entity name by applying any prefix/suffix configuration attributes to the specified value.
        Parameters:
        entityName - the entity name.
        Returns:
        The audit entity name.

      • addCustomAuditTableName

        void addCustomAuditTableName(String entityName,
                             String tableName)
        Add a custom audit table name for the specified entity name.
        Parameters:
        entityName - the entity name to register an audit table for.
        tableName - the table name to register.

      • getAuditTableName

        String getAuditTableName(String entityName,
                         String tableName)
        Get the entity name's audit table.

        This internally will first delegate to any custom registered audit tables and if none are found, it will use the specified table name applying any prefix/suffix configuration attributes to the name.

        Parameters:
        entityName - the entity name.
        tableName - the table name.
        Returns:
        the audit table name.

      • getRevisionPropertyPath

        String getRevisionPropertyPath(String propertyName)
        Get the specified propertyName's property path.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - the property name.
        Returns:
        the revision property path for the property name.
